snippet: More accusers, and a Penn State police investigator, took the stand in Jerry Sandusky’s trial on sexual-abuse charges.
abstract: Penn State University policeman testifies that he once told Jerry Sandusky that he should not shower with young boys; more accusers take the stand in Sandusky's sexual abuse trial.

byline.original: By KEN BELSON and NATE SCHWEBER

lead_paragraph: More accusers, and a Penn State police investigator, took the stand in Jerry Sandusky’s trial on sexual-abuse charges.

headline.seo: Penn State Police Officer Testifies in Sandusky Trial
headline.main: Penn State Police Officer Testifies He Warned Sandusky About Contact With Boys
